chatsystem.graphical

Class ChatGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • chatsystem.graphical.ChatGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FromUser

    public class ChatGUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements FromUser
    The Class ChatGUI is the Facade for all the GUI related components
